title: Main typeface from new Paula Scher graphic
content:
Can anyone identify the typeface used for "Questioning" in this graphic Paula Scher contributed to a project called 40 Days of Dating. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140824200318im_/http:/typophile.com/files/scher_lettering_typophile_6586.png)
author: bfingeroth
